message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our product to you. Given its unique value and potential impact on your business, we believe it is worth $1200000. We understand its importance to you and aim to strike a fair deal. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you've placed on this product,  $1200000 is still a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1050000 for it.  Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product and understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your offer of $1050000. However, due to the high demand for this product, I would like to propose an adjusted price of $1100000. This allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while still making the product accessible to you. Please let me know if this revised offer suits your needs.
